metadata.synopsis: The drow commander is leading a group of goblins in an attack on some tiefling refugees. If the players have chosen to side with her and are already killing the tieflings when she arrives, she is amused that the player has taken the initiative; they're excellent evil allies.

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: The True Soul has already begun the slaughter. Break down the gate!
0.context: NodeContext: Calling out to gathere goblins under her command at the onset of a large battle - 'True Soul' refers to the player who is actively killing tieflings and allied with the drow for now

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: The True Soul has already begun the slaughter. Charge!
1.context: NodeContext: Calling out to gathered goblins under her command at the onset of a large battle - 'True Soul' refers to the player who is actively killing tieflings and allied with the drow for now
